name: PiBakery
description: The blocks based, easy to use setup tool for Raspberry Pi

scripts.build-mac: find . -name .DS_Store -depth -exec rm {} \; && npm dedupe && electron-packager ./ PiBakery --platform=darwin --arch=all --electron-version=2.0.2 --overwrite --prune --app-version=2.0.0 --icon=./app/img/icon.icns
scripts.build-linux: find . -name .DS_Store -depth -exec rm {} \; && npm dedupe && electron-packager ./ PiBakery --platform=linux --arch=all --electron-version=2.0.2 --overwrite --prune --app-version=2.0.0 --icon=./app/img/icon.icns

author: David Ferguson <david@pibakery.org>
